parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.04

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Set unit position rules. Mode may be one of: 
* '''"DOWN"''' - person goes prone and stays prone.
* '''"UP"''' - person stands and stays standing.
* '''"MIDDLE"''' - Kneeling position.
* '''"AUTO"''' - person chooses mode according to circumstances.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> unit '''setUnitPosWeak''' mode

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mode: [[String]] - as above

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldier [[disableAI]] "FSM";
_soldier [[setUnitPosWeak]] "DOWN";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[FSM]], [[doFSM]], [[setUnitPos]], [[unitPos]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dt class="note">Unknown</dt>
<dd class="note">This command is the lowest level of priority for setting unit position and to be used in scripted	
FSM's.<br>
The current priorities are:
* 1. Unit pos commanded (from the commanding menu, higher priority).
* 2. Unit pos scripted (from [[setUnitPos]] scripting command, medium priority).
* 3. Unit pos FSM / '''setUnitPosWeak''' (used in the formation FSM, lowest priority).

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

Command most likely only works if run before [[join]] into group after [[createUnit array]].

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
